[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/credential-cache](./credential-cache.md) &gt; [RUSH\_USER\_FOLDER\_NAME](./credential-cache.rush_user_folder_name.md)

## RUSH\_USER\_FOLDER\_NAME variable

The name of the default folder in the user's home directory where Rush stores user-specific data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
RUSH_USER_FOLDER_NAME: '.rush-user'
```
